scripts.prepublish:public: npm run build && npm run bump-version
scripts.link-to-web: cd ../web && yarn link-eslint-plugin-react-memo-auto && cd ../eslint-plugin-react-memo && yarn build-and-watch
scripts.link-prepare: yarn install && yarn link && echo 'Now run "yarn link-eslint-plugin-react-memo" in mobile and web. And make sure you are running "yarn build-and-watch" to keep those dist folders available.'
scripts.unlink-prepare: yarn install && yarn unlink && echo 'Now run "yarn unlink-eslint-plugin-react-memo" in mobile and web. And make sure you are running "yarn build-and-watch" to keep those dist folders available.'
scripts.version-bump: npm version patch && git add . && git commit --allow-empty -m "version-bump"
